original_text: And there, in the presence of the people of Israel, he wrote on the stones a copy of the law of Moses, which he had written.
korean_text: 여호수아가 거기서 모세가 기록한 율법을 이스라엘 자손의 목전에서 그 돌에 기록하매

sentences.original_text: in the presence of the people of Israel,
he wrote on the stones a copy of the law of Moses,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 돌 위에 모세의 율법 사본을 기록했습니다.
